title: Calling static calculateBill method - write code

content.description:
Consider the following information about the  calculateBill  method.

The method is a  static  method in the  Store  class.

The method has one  int  parameter.

The method has return type  double.

The method can be accessed from another class.
content.question: Which of the following code segments, when appearing in a method in a class other than  Store,  will compile without error?

skill.text: 2.C: Write program code involving procedural abstractions.
